summary: Companions+ put simply is Updated Companions/followers plus a few extra characters/things.
descriptionHtml:
---more detailed version...+Updated armor and weapons to better fit skills and original classes.+Added perks on followers considering skills and original class.+Added a new Dog follower. -Working on a female Khajiit tank follower.---This mod was for personal use but grew beyond that Idea.
I'm up loading here as a back up file.just incase.
---
I used some of the facial-hair in this mod on some of the male characters.
Check out and download Mutton and Mohawk by DarkestLycan @ http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49201/?
If you like Facial-hair and/or are into steampunk looks you'll love the combinations he came up with.
author: Crazyasscc
